      • init

        public void init(int nbOfMines)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initialize this board with the number of mines past in parameter.
        Parameters:
        nbOfMines - number of mines put on this board.
        Throws:
        If - there is more nbOfMines than squares on the board.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • win

        Determine if the board is a win one.
        Returns:
